biotools.summary: TIS Correction (TiCo) is a tool for improving predictions of prokaryotic Translation Initiation Sites (TIS). TiCo can be used to analyze and reannotate predictions obtained by the program GLIMMER.

bioschemas.name: TiCo
bioschemas.summary: TIS Correction (TiCo) is a tool for improving predictions of prokaryotic Translation Initiation Sites (TIS). TiCo can be used to analyze and reannotate predictions obtained by the program GLIMMER.
